thread.title: Over priced with under delivery
thread.title_full: Over priced with under delivery - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: 91cathrynf
title: Over priced with under delivery
text: We had a 2 bedroom appt which was described as "luxury". It was anything but. The furniture and decor was old and dated, the main bedroom had 2 single beds of different heights pushed together and called this a king. The main ensuite had no shower, only a small bath. The TV couch was very small and extremely uncomfortable and for a 4 person appt, you could only get 2 on the couch. This was terrible value and I believe well overpriced and I'll never stay there again.
